title: Advanced Investment Concepts
description: Exploration of alternative investments, advanced investment vehicles, emerging assets, and sophisticated wealth-building strategies. Building on fundamental and portfolio management knowledge, this chapter introduces students to real estate investing, REITs, commodities, cryptocurrency basics, and advanced planning considerations for long-term wealth accumulation.
learning_objectives: Analyze alternative investment options including real estate, REITs, and commodities
Evaluate emerging investment vehicles such as cryptocurrency and their role in portfolios
Understand advanced investment concepts including derivatives, hedge strategies, and leverage
Apply sophisticated wealth-building strategies appropriate for different financial goals
Make informed decisions about incorporating alternative investments into comprehensive financial plans

skill_builder.title: Alternative Investment Analyzer
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students explore alternative investments, compare risk-return characteristics to traditional assets, evaluate portfolio fit, and make informed decisions about incorporating non-traditional investments into wealth-building strategies.
